Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to increasing benefits payable by the correction officers' variable supplements fund to beneficiaries
Summary: Increases benefits payable by the correction officers' variable supplements fund to beneficiaries.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-194, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing benefits payable by the correction officers' variable supplements fund to beneficiaries
